name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in **Azure**, **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)**, **Terraform**, **Bicep**, and **ARM Templates**. Expertise in leveraging **Defender for Cloud** and **Sentinel** for enhancing **Zero-Trust Security** frameworks. Proficient in designing robust **Cloud Architecture** and executing cloud strategies that prioritize security, compliance, and governance. Strong background in **Microsoft 365**, ensuring enterprise-grade compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
Demonstrated ability to integrate AI/ML capabilities into cloud solutions, develop scalable microservices, and employ CI/CD best practices to streamline deployment processes. Proven track record in healthcare and financial sectors, delivering high-performance, mission-critical applications that leverage modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
